input.bullet_points:
24-ounce insulated stainless-steel water bottle with a FreeSip spout and push-button lid with lock
Patented FreeSip spout designed for either sipping upright through the built-in straw or tilting back to swig from the spout opening
Protective push-to-open lid keeps spout clean; convenient carry loop doubles as a lock
Double-wall insulation keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours; wide opening for cleaning and adding ice; cup holder-friendly base
BPA, lead, and phthalate-free; hand wash cup, dishwasher-safe lid; not for use with hot liquids
input.description: The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid easily tackles every thirst. With a built-in, easy-clean straw and a wide-mouth opening, the FreeSip reusable bottle is designed for drinking two different ways: sipping upright through the straw or tilting back to swig from the wide-mouth spout opening. Add in a push-to-open lid and playful colors, and staying hydrated has never been simpler—or more fun. Additional features include double-wall insulated stainless steel that keeps drinks cold up to 24 hours, a carry loop that doubles as a lock, a cup holder-friendly base, and a wide opening for easy cleaning and adding ice. The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless-Steel Water Bottle with Locking Push-Button Lid is available in three sizes: 24-Ounce, 32-Ounce, and 40-Ounce. Lid is dishwasher safe; hand wash cup. Not for use with hot liquids. Manufacturer’s limited lifetime warranty.
input.title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw, BPA-Free Sports Water Bottle, Great for Travel, 24 Oz, Denim

The front center zipper has dual side zipper chin guard, providing close-fitting comfort

4 POCKETS The men's puffy quilted jacket includes 2 external zippered hand warmer pockets and 2 large internal pockets, perfect for storing money, keys, phone, wallet, passport, and other items, providing great privacy and convenience

input.bullet_points:
Vacuum Lock + Gel Base — For Smooth, Flat Surfaces: Features a rotary vacuum-lock and 4-layer washable gel base that forms a rock-solid hold on flat, non-textured surfaces such as glass, glossy dashboards, or hard leather. input.description:
Product Description

America’s #1 Longwear Eyeliner.* Revlon ColorStay Eyeliner Pencil delivers rich, lasting color that looks freshly applied all day long, and glides on smoothly in totally wearable, everyday shades. Whether you want to go subtle or dramatic, this eyeliner pencil creates the look you want and stays on strong. Formulated with ColorStay Adapti-Flex Color Lock Technology™. Waterproof, smudge-proof, fade-proof, and transfer-proof. Up to 24HR wear. Plus, it has a built-in sharpener and smudger. *Revlon Consumer Products Corporation’s calculation based in part on data reported by Circana, LLC, through its OmniMarket Service of Total US Multi-Outlet for Makeup Category, Eyeliner Subcategory for the 52-week period ending 11-24-2024 using Revlon’s custom definitions.

By Revlon

input.bullet_points:
DURABLE, HEAT RESISTANT SILICONE - The Kitchen Aid Ribbed Soft Silicone mitts are heat resistant up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit to safely shield hands from the heat while cooking and handling hot pans and dishes.
WATERPROOF & SLIP-RESISTANT - These silicone mitts are water resistant for additional protection from hot spills and spots with a textured, ribbed stripe design for a safe and secure grip.
SET OF TWO- Includes two (2) generously sized oven mitts that each measures 7" wide x 13" long for a comfortable fit.
ADDITIONAL PROTECTION & COMFORT - The 100% cotton cuff provides additional protection from the heat with polyester lining that offers comfort and insulation.
EASY CARE - These Kitchen Aid oven mitts can be easily cleaned. Simply rinse off with water and wipe them clean.
input.description: Perform your kitchen tasks safely with the Kitchen Aid Ribbed Soft Silicone 2-Piece Oven Mitt Set. The textured, ribb stripe design offers a secure grip while handling hot objects. Made of durable and waterproof silicone with a cotton cuff that provides additional shield from the heat and polyester lining that offers comfort and insulation. Each oven mitt measures 7 inches by 13 inches for a generous fit. They are heat resistant up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit. input.bullet_points:
EXPERIENCE THE CLASSIC CONVERSION PLAY OF TRANSFORMERS TOYS: Transformers toys that change from robot to vehicle have captivated kids for generations.
2 TOYS IN 1: This toy robot changes into the signature red and blue Optimus Prime toy truck in 6 simple steps. Easy conversion for kids 6 years old and up.
FAVORITE TRANSFORMERS CHARACTER: Transformers follows the story of the heroic Autobots, who fight to protect all life, and the evil Decepticons, who seek to conquer the universe. This timeless 11-inch Cyber Commander Series figure depicts Optimus Prime, legendary leader of the Autobots--essential when starting a Transformers toy collection.
IMAGINE EXCITING BATTLES: Collect other 11-inch Cyber Commander Series Transformers figures so kids can imagine their own Autobot vs. Decepticon battles (Each sold separately. Subject to availability).
MAKES A GREAT GIFT: This classic Optimus Prime action figure makes the perfect birthday or holiday gift.
input.description: Bring home the excitement of Transformers robots with this Cyber Commander series Optimus Prime figure! The Transformers are sentient robots from the distant planet, Cybertron. Two factions, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons are in an ever-raging battle. The legendary Autobot leader, Optimus Prime, fights to defend all life, while his nemesis, the merciless Decepticon leader, Megatron, fights to destroy it. This timeless 11-inch scale Transformers Optimus Prime figure is essential when starting a Transformers toy collection. Featuring classic Transformers conversion for kids 6 and up, kids can change this Optimus Prime action figure from toy robot to toy truck in 6 easy steps. Collect other Cyber Commander Series figures so kids can create their own Autobot vs. Decepticon battles and imagine Optimus Prime leading the heroic Autobots against the evil Decepticons! (Each sold separately. Subject to availability). Transformers and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
input.title: Transformers Toys Heroic Optimus Prime Action Figure - Timeless Large-Scale Figure, Changes into Toy Truck - Toys for Kids 6 and Up, 11-inch (Amazon Exclusive)

input.description:
Pediatric size RxCrush Pill Pouch. Fits in RxCrush Pill Crusher and other pill crushers that require a pouch. Can be used with 1ml, 3ml, 5ml ENFit syringes or larger. Smooth interior contours that restrict less medication delivering more accurate dose. Full Locking ENFit nozzle for more sure connection to syringe. Zip seal will not leak. RxCrush Pill Pouch with locking ENFit, ISO 80369-3 compliant. Use pouch to contain hazardous drugs to assist with USP<800>, USP<795>, and USP<797> compliance. ENFit tip fits to ENFit syringes. With transition connectors other style syringes can be attached. Syringe not included. See SYEN1-LDT, SYEN3-LDT, SYEN5 or SYEN10-2. Pouch cap not included. See CA02 or CA03. Thickness: 4 mil. Dimensions: 2" x 4.375" x 0.5" each. 7" x 9" x 2" for pack of 50. Optimal pill capacity is about 5, depending on the medication.
Instructions for PP08 Pediatric Pill Pouch Insert pills into pouch to contain medication dust while crushing with RxCrush Pill Crusher. Connect pouch to a water-filled ENFit syringe. Do not inject water yet. Hold pouch by syringe and crush medications in RxCrush Pill Crusher, (see procedure under RxCrush Pill Crusher PPC11 Inject water into pouch after pills are pulverized. Shake pouch until crushed pills are dissolved in the water. Withdraw contents into syringe. Disconnect syringe from pouch and administer contents into feeding tube, food or drink. Flush pouch with additional water until all medication has been removed from pouch.
input.title: RxCrush Pediatric Pill Pouch with Locking ENFit - Qty 50

input.bullet_points:
EASY ONE TOUCH MECHANISM: Press the locking side arms with a quick one-handed motion, and place your phone against the trigger button. The mount’s arms will close automatically, holding your device securely while you drive. Mount or remove your phone in seconds with the patented Easy One Touch Mechanism.
WIDE COMPATIBILITY: New larger Easy One Touch button, with a universal cradle that fits smartphones and cases of any size.
MAGNETIC CORD ORGANIZER: Keep charging cables neatly organized with the magnetic tab located near the bottom foot
TELESCOPIC ARM: The improved telescopic arm now extends from 5 inches to 8 inches (as opposed to the Easy One Touch 4 which only extended to 6.5inch) and pivots 260 degrees. This enables a myriad of customized viewing angles while you’re on the road.
ADJUSTABLE BOTTOM FOOT: You can easily and securely adjust the bottom foot by squeezing the spring button.
input.description: The Easy One Touch 5 Dash and Windshield Mount is the next generation top car mount in the U.S. Featuring the Patented Easy One Touch Mechanism, you can lock and release smartphones quickly with a one handed motion. Recognized for superior quality and sleek design, the new Easy One Touch 5 series features a new finish that complements modern automotive interiors.
input.title: iOttie Easy One Touch Signature Dashboard & Windshield Universal Car Mount Phone Holder Desk Stand with Suction Cup Base and Telescopic Arm for iPhone, Samsung, Google, More Smartphones

evaluations.reasoning: The module output includes several variations of the brand name 'Apple', but it fails to include 'AirPods Pro' and 'AirPods Pro 2', which are also relevant brand entities from the listing. Therefore, it does not meet the requirement of extracting all relevant brand names.

input.bullet_points:
PIONEERING HEARING — AirPods Pro 2 unlock the world’s first all-in-one hearing health experience: a scientifically validated Hearing Test,* clinical-grade and active Hearing Protection.*
INTELLIGENT NOISE CONTROL — Active Noise Cancellation removes up to 2x more background noise.* Transparency mode lets you hear the world around you, and Adaptive Audio seamlessly blends Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency mode for the best listening experience in any environment.* And when you’re speaking with someone nearby, Conversation Awareness automatically lowers the volume of what’s playing.*
IMPROVED SOUND AND CALL QUALITY — The Apple-designed H2 chip helps to create deeply immersive sound. The low-distortion, custom-built driver delivers crisp, clear high notes and full, rich bass in stunning definition. Voice Isolation improves the quality of phone calls in loud conditions.*
CUSTOMIZABLE FIT — Includes four pairs of silicone tips (XS, S, M, L) to fit a wide range of ear shapes and provide all-day comfort. The tips create an acoustic seal to help keep out noise and secure AirPods Pro 2 in place.
DUST, SWEAT, AND WATER RESISTANT — Both AirPods Pro and the MagSafe Charging Case are IP54 dust, sweat, and water resistant, so you can listen comfortably in more conditions.*
PERSONALIZED SPATIAL AUDIO — With sound that suits your unique ear shape along with dynamic head tracking, AirPods Pro 2 deliver an immersive listening experience that places sound all around you.* You can also listen to select songs, shows, and movies in Dolby Atmos.
A HIGHER LEVEL OF CONTROL — Simply swipe, press, and hold the stem to manage playback functions using Touch control. And with Siri Interactions, simply nod your head yes or shake your head no when Siri asks if you’d like to hear a message, answer a call, or manage a notification.*
LONG BATTERY LIFE — Get up to 6 hours of listening time with Active Noise Cancellation enabled. And get up to 30 hours of total listening time with Active Noise Cancellation enabled, using the case.*
A MORE CAPABLE CASE— Keep track of AirPods Pro 2 with Precision Finding and a built-in speaker.* A lanyard loop helps keep your AirPods Pro 2 close. Charge with an Apple Watch or MagSafe Charger, USB-C Charge Cable, or Qi-certified charger.
LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See “Additional information” to learn more.
input.description: AirPods Pro earbuds feature up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation, plus Adaptive Transparency, and Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking for immersive sound. Now with multiple ear tips (XS, S, M, L) and up to 6 hours of listening time.
input.title: Apple AirPods Pro 2 Wireless Earbuds, Active Noise Cancellation, Hearing Aid Feature, Bluetooth Headphones, Transparency, Personalized Spatial Audio, High-Fidelity Sound, H2 Chip, USB-C Charging

INTELLIGENT NOISE CONTROL — Active Noise Cancellation removes up to 2x more background noise.* Transparency mode lets you hear the world around you, and Adaptive Audio seamlessly blends Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency mode for the best listening experience in any environment.* And when you’re speaking with someone nearby, Conversation Awareness automatically lowers the volume of what’s playing.*
IMPROVED SOUND AND CALL QUALITY — The Apple-designed H2 chip helps to create deeply immersive sound. The low-distortion, custom-built driver delivers crisp, clear high notes and full, rich bass in stunning definition. Voice Isolation improves the quality of phone calls in loud conditions.*
CUSTOMIZABLE FIT — Includes four pairs of silicone tips (XS, S, M, L) to fit a wide range of ear shapes and provide all-day comfort. The tips create an acoustic seal to help keep out noise and secure AirPods Pro 2 in place.
DUST, SWEAT, AND WATER RESISTANT — Both AirPods Pro and the MagSafe Charging Case are IP54 dust, sweat, and water resistant, so you can listen comfortably in more conditions.*
PERSONALIZED SPATIAL AUDIO — With sound that suits your unique ear shape along with dynamic head tracking, AirPods Pro 2 deliver an immersive listening experience that places sound all around you.* You can also listen to select songs, shows, and movies in Dolby Atmos.
A HIGHER LEVEL OF CONTROL — Simply swipe, press, and hold the stem to manage playback functions using Touch control. And with Siri Interactions, simply nod your head yes or shake your head no when Siri asks if you’d like to hear a message, answer a call, or manage a notification.*
LONG BATTERY LIFE — Get up to 6 hours of listening time with Active Noise Cancellation enabled. And get up to 30 hours of total listening time with Active Noise Cancellation enabled, using the case.*
A MORE CAPABLE CASE— Keep track of AirPods Pro 2 with Precision Finding and a built-in speaker.* A lanyard loop helps keep your AirPods Pro 2 close. Charge with an Apple Watch or MagSafe Charger, USB-C Charge Cable, or Qi-certified charger.
LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See “Additional information” to learn more.
input.description: AirPods Pro earbuds feature up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation, plus Adaptive Transparency, and Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking for immersive sound. Now with multiple ear tips (XS, S, M, L) and up to 6 hours of listening time.
input.title: Apple AirPods Pro 2 Wireless Earbuds, Active Noise Cancellation, Hearing Aid Feature, Bluetooth Headphones, Transparency, Personalized Spatial Audio, High-Fidelity Sound, H2 Chip, USB-C Charging

CUP HOLDER COMPATIBLE: Fits most car cup holders so you can drink your favorite cold beverages wherever the day takes you

input.description: The 24oz Stainless Steel Water Bottle from the ALTA SERIES BY THERMOS keeps you in the game. Equipped with a hygienic covered spout, locking cap and carry handle, this bottle has you completely covered from hikes uphill to treks downtown. To reach your hydration goals for the day, the hydration intake meter helps you track how many bottles you drink each day. Fits most car cup holders so you can drink your favorite cold beverages wherever the day takes you. Dishwasher safe (top rack). Not for hot liquids.

evaluations.reasoning: The extracted brand names include 'The North Face' and its minor variations, which closely match the listing brand. The variations in casing and minor typos do not disqualify the output.

input.bullet_points:
SEIZE THE DAY. Move with purpose in the Men's Aconcagua Hoodie. Featuring secure zip handwarmer pockets, perfect for your phone or keys, and durable elastic bound cuffs, this insulated and windproof winter style will quickly become your go to.
WARM INSULATION: Take on the cold with superior warmth thanks to a 50/50 blend of recycled 600-fill waterfowl down and recycled polyester insulation. Zoned recycled polyester sheet insulation helps keep you warm, even in wet weather.
WIND & WATER RESISTANT: Made from 100% recycled polyester with WindWall fabric, this wind-resistant jacket features a non-PFC Durable Water-Repellent (DWR) finish for added protection from the elements.
STANDARD FIT: With a flattering shape and ample mobility through the chest and shoulders, this hoodie fits true-to-size for easy, comfortable movement and can be worn over mid-layers.
OUTDOOR VERSATILITY: Never Stop Exploring with thoughtful features that help you go further � the attached, adjustable, 3-piece hood has an easy cinch-cord and cord-lock, while secure-zip hand warmer pockets keep hands (and valuables) protected.
input.description:
Description

Since 1966, The North Face has led the way in innovation, crafting high-performance, eco-conscious insulated apparel designed for all explorers. Our collection includes everything from down parkas for maximum warmth to lightweight, packable options for easy layering. Whether you're hitting the slopes, tackling backcountry trails, or navigating everyday winter weather, these jackets, pants, and boots will keep you warm, dry, and protected. With water-resistant, non-PFC Durable Water-Repellent (DWR) treatments and fully waterproof designs, you can trust that snow, rain, and wind are no match. Our rain jacket and windbreaker options are perfect for unpredictable conditions, while high-loft insulation styles trap heat and keep the cold out. Many styles are designed with sustainability in mind, empowering you to explore with the knowledge that you're supporting a better future. Whether you need a versatile cool-weather jacket or heavy insulation for outdoor adventures, The North Face has the perfect insulated style for you. Gear up for the cold and Never Stop Exploring.
input.title: The North Face Men's Aconcagua 3 Lined Hoodie Wind Resistant, Water Repellent, 600 Fill Waterfowl Down Insulation, 3 Piece Hood, New Taupe Green, Large

input.description:
Description

Since 1966, The North Face has led the way in innovation, crafting high-performance, eco-conscious insulated apparel designed for all explorers. Our collection includes everything from down parkas for maximum warmth to lightweight, packable options for easy layering. Whether you're hitting the slopes, tackling backcountry trails, or navigating everyday winter weather, these jackets, pants, and boots will keep you warm, dry, and protected. With water-resistant, non-PFC Durable Water-Repellent (DWR) treatments and fully waterproof designs, you can trust that snow, rain, and wind are no match. Our rain jacket and windbreaker options are perfect for unpredictable conditions, while high-loft insulation styles trap heat and keep the cold out. Many styles are designed with sustainability in mind, empowering you to explore with the knowledge that you're supporting a better future. Whether you need a versatile cool-weather jacket or heavy insulation for outdoor adventures, The North Face has the perfect insulated style for you. Gear up for the cold and Never Stop Exploring.

input.bullet_points:
Sleek Design - Never run out of ice again with the Frigidaire Ice Maker that produces up to 26 lbs. of ice per day. Elevate your space with its sleek stainless steel countertop design that blends seamlessly with any kitchen, bar, office, or dorm.
Fast Ice Production - This compact ice maker makes hosting easy! It churns out 9 bullet-shaped ice cubes every 7 minutes, with two size options to suit any beverage or occasion.
Intuitive Control - The ice maker features a transparent window so you can easily monitor ice levels and see when ice is being made. Take full control with the digital LED control panel, allowing easy adjustment of settings and ice size selection for ultimate convenience.
Large Water Capacity - With a 2.1 qt. water tank capacity, you can enjoy uninterrupted ice making without having to constantly refill. Say goodbye to tedious cleaning routines with the drain plug feature that provides easy emptying and cleaning for hassle-free maintenance.
Bonus Accessory - Enhance your ice making experience with the included ice scoop for easy retrieval of ice cubes. The interior basket holds up to 1.5 lbs. of ice at a time, so you’ll always have ice on hand.
input.description: Frigidaire EFIC117-SS 26 Pound Ice Maker, 26 lbs per day, Stainless
input.title: Frigidaire 26 Lbs per Day Portable Compact Maker, Ice Making Machine, Stainless, Medium

input.bullet_points:
PENCIL EYELINER: Easy automatic Clinique eyeliner pencil lines and defines eyes in one simple stroke. Needs no sharpening.
SMOOTH + SMUDGE RESISTANT: Silky, long-lasting eyeliner also delivers transfer-resistant color.
VERSATILE SHADES: Create endless eye looks with a wide range of richly pigmented and colorful eyeliner shades.
THE CLINIQUE EYE SAFETY PROMISE: Like all Clinique eye makeup, Quickliner For Eyes is ophthalmologist tested, safe for sensitive eyes, and safe for contact lens wearers. It’s also allergy tested, 100% fragrance free.
BUILT ON DERMATOLOGICAL SCIENCE: As a dermatologist-guided brand, Clinique’s commitment to safety starts with skincare science. We partner with the best minds in dermatology and formulate for all skin types, tones, concerns—in service of all skin.
input.description: Line and define eyes in one simple stroke with Clinique’s Quickliner For Eyes. This easy eyeliner pencil twists up, glides on, and needs no sharpening. The silky lashline eyeliner allows for smooth application and delivers long-wearing color: transfer resistant, water resistant, smudge resistant. A built-in smudge tip on the opposite end can be used to soften the line. Use it to create versatile looks from defined to smoky. Gives you time to play: formula allows 60 seconds for blending and smudging before setting. Available in a range of versatile shades. Quickliner For Eyes eyeliner delivers bold drama that’s easy on the eyes, with a formula that’s ophthalmologist tested, safe for sensitive eyes, and safe for contact lens wearers.
input.title: Clinique Quickliner For Eyes Eyeliner Pencil | Water Resistant, Smudge Resistant + Safe For Sensitive Eyes, New Black, 1 Count

evaluations.reasoning: The module output includes the correct brand name 'Big Red House' and several minor variations that are acceptable according to the rubric. Although there are some misspellings and variations, they do not deviate significantly from the original brand name.

input.bullet_points:
Big Red House oven mitts offer durability, comfort, and superior heat protection in a wide variety of colors that will match any kitchen. Protect your hands from high temperatures while maintaining a secure grip without sacrificing style.
These oven mitts are designed to withstand everyday use. Made from a combination of heat resistant silicone and soft cotton, they offer enhanced grip and flexibility while maintaining strong protection against heat.
These essential kitchen mitts protect your hands from temperatures up to 536°F / 280°C. They're designed to allow for easy handling of hot pans, baking sheets, and oven racks. For open flame or broiling, additional protective covering is recommended.
Big Red House oven mitts are available in two styles: standard and mini. Standard mitts measure 13" long, and the mini mitts measure 10" long. The standard size is perfect for larger hands who have trouble finding adequate heat protection.
Big Red House oven mitts offer an excellent grip on hot items, thanks to their silicone-lined palms that offer non-slip control. The flexible cotton construction lets you safely tough hot surfaces without being excessively bulky.
Each purchase includes one pair (two) of Big Red House oven mitts in matching colors. Choose from black, red, gray, royal blue, green, turquoise, pink, and blue denim.
These oven mitts provide full hand and wrist coverage for added protection. The silicone grip ensures a secure hold on hot cookware, while the soft cotton interior provides insulation. For easy storage, each mitt has a convenient hanging loop.
Machine washable for easy cleaning. Simply toss them in the washing machine with cold water and use a gentle cycle. Air drying is recommended to maintain their shape and durability. Avoid bleach or high heat to preserve insulation and silicone grip.
Big Red House heat protection accessories are not intended to be water proof or water resistant. However, the high quality cotton will absorb some liquid without compromising the superior grip if splashed.
Not a fan of oven mitts? Big Red House also offers traditional square pot holders. Long double oven mitts let you remove wide baking dishes and pots with extra protection for your body and arms.
input.title: Big Red House - Silicone Oven Mitts - Gray Set of 2-12.5" - Heat Resistant to 536 F / 280 C Kitchen Gloves - Professional Grade Protection Hot Cooking Baking

These essential kitchen mitts protect your hands from temperatures up to 536°F / 280°C. They're designed to allow for easy handling of hot pans, baking sheets, and oven racks. For open flame or broiling, additional protective covering is recommended.
Big Red House oven mitts are available in two styles: standard and mini. Standard mitts measure 13" long, and the mini mitts measure 10" long. The standard size is perfect for larger hands who have trouble finding adequate heat protection.
Big Red House oven mitts offer an excellent grip on hot items, thanks to their silicone-lined palms that offer non-slip control. The flexible cotton construction lets you safely tough hot surfaces without being excessively bulky.
Each purchase includes one pair (two) of Big Red House oven mitts in matching colors. Choose from black, red, gray, royal blue, green, turquoise, pink, and blue denim.
These oven mitts provide full hand and wrist coverage for added protection. The silicone grip ensures a secure hold on hot cookware, while the soft cotton interior provides insulation. For easy storage, each mitt has a convenient hanging loop.
Machine washable for easy cleaning. Simply toss them in the washing machine with cold water and use a gentle cycle. Air drying is recommended to maintain their shape and durability. Avoid bleach or high heat to preserve insulation and silicone grip.
Big Red House heat protection accessories are not intended to be water proof or water resistant. However, the high quality cotton will absorb some liquid without compromising the superior grip if splashed.
Not a fan of oven mitts? Big Red House also offers traditional square pot holders. Long double oven mitts let you remove wide baking dishes and pots with extra protection for your body and arms.
input.title: Big Red House - Silicone Oven Mitts - Gray Set of 2-12.5" - Heat Resistant to 536 F / 280 C Kitchen Gloves - Professional Grade Protection Hot Cooking Baking

input.bullet_points:
QUICK AND PAINLESS — MyHelp emergency butterfly bandages for wound closure keep the wound closed providing it with strong and secure support. These emergency wound closure strips help to heal small cuts in days and protect the wound from exposure.
FIRST AID KIT MUST-HAVE — The wound closure kit includes all you need to close the wound effectively. It comes with 20 butterfly stitches bandages, 4 laceration closure strips, eight cleaning wipes, and four adhesive dressings. All instruments are individually packed and made of hypoallergenic materials.
STITCHLESS — Having an emergency laceration kit on hand may save you a trip to the ER and reduce secondary trauma. Butterfly closure bandages are a must-have for those living far away from a hospital, working on a farm, and who like outdoor activities.
EASY TO APPLY AND REMOVE — MyHelp emergency laceration closures are designed to be easy to use which makes them ideal for kids. Following the instructions, you can apply or remove butterfly strips for wound closure in seconds.
REDUCE SCARRING — Unlike traditional stitches, butterfly stitches for wounds thanks to their non-invasive technique go without any punctures. In this way, by using MyHelp kit the chances of infection are reduced, and the formation of scarring is minimized.
MIX PACK — You’ll get three types of first aid wound closure devices that allow you to use them on various types of wounds. MyHelp butterfly sutures — the #1 choice for your first aid kit!
input.title: Emergency Wound Closure Strips - 24pk - 3 Types Easy to Use Butterfly Bandages - Stitchless & Painless Laceration Closure Kit

input.bullet_points:
【Fit Your Vehicle Exactly】These custom floor liners fit for Camry 2012-2017. Binmotor car floor mats are accurately scanned by professional 3D laser scanner to make the car floor mats and the original car data accurately match. What's more, details such as throttle and brake were noted during the design process, which will not affect you when you drive.
【TPE Material】Binmotor car floor mats are made of high quality Thermoplastic Elastomer(TPE) materials, which makes car floor mats both soft and durable. This kind of high quality materials even in hot weather does not melt.
【Anti-slip Design】The car floor mats are fixed with buckles on the back, so the mat always stay in place, which gives your foot more traction & comfort. The Binmotor floor mats promise you a safer and perfect driving experience.
【All-Weather Protection】Our floor mats are designed with a high edge that help contain rain, snow, muddy fallen leaves, food debris, liquids or debris, giving your car perfect protection in all weather and keeping your car clean. Binmotor vehicles floor liners are designed to stand up to the most extreme weather conditions. Multiple tests prove that it won't crack, curl or break down.
【Easy To Clean】Binmotor floor mats are waterproof, just wipe smudges off with a damp cloth or wash and dried. They are incredibly easy to clean.
input.title: Binmotor-Floor Mats for Toyota Camry 2012-2017, Front & 2nd Row,TPE All Weather Car Accessories Mats Camry Custom Fit Liners Waterproof, Nonslip

【Strengthened Grip, Steady Hold】The vacuum magnetic phone holder uses N52 magnets with 2800GF pull force and strong suction to lock your phone tightly in place. It stays secure even on bumps, sharp turns, and sudden stops. Mount it on smooth surfaces, or use the round base for textured surfaces.
【Flexible Angles, Compact Design】 Adjust your vacuum suction phone holder to any angle with 360° rotation and 270° tilt. Mount it on your car’s console, infotainment screen, or windshield, or use it anywhere you need. When not in use, fold it flat for easy storage and easy to carry anywhere.
【Mount Up in 3 Seconds】 Secure your magnetic phone holder for car in just 3 seconds. Press the suction cup to remove air, then twist to lock and create strong vacuum suction. No tools, no hassle—just a quick setup that gives your phone a firm, steady hold wherever you mount it.
【One Stand, Endless Uses】 Use your vacuum suction magnetic phone holder for hands-free help anywhere—GPS while driving, video calls at work, recipes in the kitchen, or workouts at the gym. Stable and reliable, it keeps your phone secure through all your daily activities.
【Wide Compatibility】This vacuum magnetic phone stand works with iPhone 12/13/14/15/16 series and MagSafe cases. For non-MagSafe phones, use the included metal ring for secure attachment. Enjoy a stable, reliable magnetic hold anytime and anywhere.
⚠️ Important Notice: ⚠️ ✅ For Smooth Yet Textured Surfaces: Use the included adhesive pad to ensure a secure mount. Avoid mounting on fluctuating or uneven surfaces. ⚠️ For Non-Magnetic Phones and Cases: Use the included magnetic ring. ❌ Not Recommended: Mounting the adhesive pad on an uneven car dashboard. ❓ How to Check Surface Smoothness Without the Adhesive Pad: Scratch a circle with your fingernail. If the surface feels smooth and makes no sound, it is suitable for mounting without the adhesive pad.
【Use on the dashboard】: To ensure optimal performance of our products on the dashboard, it is essential to use them in conjunction with the included Round Base. The dashboard's texture may not be smooth enough to support direct attachment. The Round Base provides a stable and smooth surface. It must be securely affixed to the dashboard first. Once the Round Base is in place, it can effectively support the magnetic phone holder, allowing our products to function properly.
input.title: 2026 Upgraded 360° Vacuum Magnetic Car Phone Holder for Magsafe [96+LBS Strongest Suction & 2800gf Strongest Magnetic], Adjustable Car Phone Mount for Your Car/Gym/Mirror/Shower for iPhone & Android

input.bullet_points:
ALL DAY COMFORT: Light and compact to give you all-day comfort and designed for the ideal fit, for an exceptional all-round listening experience.
LONG BATTERY LIFE & QUICK CHARGING: Up to 11 hours of battery life (up to 22hrs with case) with quick charging (5 min charge for up to 1 hour of playback).
MULTIPOINT CONNECTION: Quickly switch between two devices at once.
STAY CONNECTED: Ambient Sound Mode keeps you aware of your surroundings.
EASY HANDS- FREE CALLING: A built-in microphone provides you with hands-free calling. No need to even take your phone from your pocket.
WATER RESISTANT: With an IPX4 resistance rating, splashes and sweat won’t stop these headphones – so you can keep moving to the music.
GIVE YOUR MUSIC A BOOST: Boost the quality of compressed music files and enjoy streaming music with high quality sound through DSEE.
POCKED SIZED CASE: Small and cylindrical, the charging case is made to fit your pocket or your bag.
EASY BUTTON OPERATION: Play, stop, skip tracks, adjust the volume, access your smartphone’s voice assistant and receive calls hands-free with the touch of a button.
IN THE BOX: Wireless Earbuds, Hybrid Silicone Earbud Tips, Charging Case (Charging cable sold separately)

input.bullet_points:
The perfect addition to your rough commutes, day hikes, or kayak sessions, this insulated water bottle has the power to keep your water cold (or coffee hot) until the last sip. And with the leakproof while closed YETI Straw Cap, you’ve got a bottle made for every day, easy sippin’
DOUBLE-WALL VACUUM INSULATION - Keeps cold drinks cold and hot drinks hot until the last sip, and the No Sweat exterior
18/8 STAINLESS STEEL - Made with kitchen-grade stainless steel, so they’re puncture and rust-resistant
DISHWASHER SAFE - Because no one needs more work to do
Note: Do not use the YETI Rambler Bottle Straw Cap with hot, carbonated, or pulpy beverages or for storage of food or perishables

input.bullet_points:
OMNI-HEAT: Lightweight warmth for mild to severe cold. This patented technology reflects and retains body heat while maintaining breathability for all-day comfort.
OMNI-SHIELD: For light precipitation and everyday protection against stains, this garment repels rain, resists stains, and dries quickly.
TURBODOWN: Built for moderate to extreme cold. Combines synthetic insulation with natural down for lightweight warmth—even when wet.
85% RECYCLED INSULATION: You'll feel better knowing this jacket infuses warm Microtemp XF II insulation made from 85% recycled polyester along with the down fill.
HANDY FEATURES: Includes zippered hand pockets, an interior security pocket, soft binding at the cuffs, and a drawcord-adjustable hem for customizable warmth and fit.
input.description:
Description

You'll find magic in this technical jacket. It combines our RDS certified 590 TurboDown fill, 40g recycled polyester fill, and leverages our Omni-Heat Thermal Reflective lining. It's a rain and stain resistant jacket that efficiently retains your body heat and is one of the warmest, softest, and lightest jackets we make.   The Turbodown insulation works in concert with our breathable heat reflective interior, to create a lightweight performance jacket. Zippered side pockets keeps things secure and handy, while an internal security pocket keeps extra important items safe. The water resistant fabric, with a drawcord adjustable hem, as well as snug binding at the cuffs all work to keep you warm and protected during most anything Fall and Winter can dish out.   This cold-weather coat comes in multiple colors and sizes. Available in extended sizing. Regular Fit. To ensure the correct sizing, please utilize our sizing chart and the following measurement instructions: For the chest, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.
input.title: Columbia Men's Voodoo Falls 590 Turbodown II Jacket, Black, Medium

Infallible Never Fail Smudge-Proof Eyeliner: Mechanical pencil eyeliner with built in sharpener is formulated to glide on easily and stay put for up to 16hrs; This rich, creamy eye pencil delivers long-lasting fade-proof color
Never Fail Eye Liner: Glides on to create classic to bold eye designs to compliment any mood or occasion; Use the built-in sharpener and smudge to optimize pencil tip for versatile eye looks

input.description: Create classic to bold eye designs with Infallible Never Fail Mechanical Eyeliner. The rich and creamy formula glides on easily and evenly for fade-proof color that stays all day. Use the built-in smudger and sharpener to create versatile eye looks for any occasion. Packaging may vary. What you receive may not be what is reflected on site. • Mechanical Pencil Eyeliner • Rich, Crème Formula • Built in Sharpener and Smudger • Smudge-proof, Up to 16HR 16-hour wear Apply along lash line starting from inner corner of eye working outwards. For a smoky look, gently smudge line with built-in smudger. Warning: Eye cosmetics in a scratched, infected or irritated eye and scratches from cosmetic eye applicators can lead to eye damage, and in extreme cases, even blindness. If your eye is scratched, stop using all eye cosmetics and go to an ophthalmologist immediately. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle.

input.bullet_points:
DURABLE, HEAT RESISTANT SILICONE - The Kitchen Aid Ribbed Soft Silicone mitts are heat resistant up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit to safely shield hands from the heat while cooking and handling hot pans and dishes.
WATERPROOF & SLIP-RESISTANT - These silicone mitts are water resistant for additional protection from hot spills and spots with a textured, ribbed stripe design for a safe and secure grip.
SET OF TWO- Includes two (2) generously sized oven mitts that each measures 7" wide x 13" long for a comfortable fit.
ADDITIONAL PROTECTION & COMFORT - The 100% cotton cuff provides additional protection from the heat with polyester lining that offers comfort and insulation.
EASY CARE - These Kitchen Aid oven mitts can be easily cleaned. Simply rinse off with water and wipe them clean.
input.description: Perform your kitchen tasks safely with the Kitchen Aid Ribbed Soft Silicone 2-Piece Oven Mitt Set. The textured, ribb stripe design offers a secure grip while handling hot objects. Made of durable and waterproof silicone with a cotton cuff that provides additional shield from the heat and polyester lining that offers comfort and insulation. Each oven mitt measures 7 inches by 13 inches for a generous fit. They are heat resistant up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit. Coordinate these oven mitts with coordinating Kitchen Aid Ribbed Soft Silicone Pot Holders for a complete set.

input.bullet_points:
RELIABLY KEEP WOUNDS CLOSED — MYHELP emergency laceration closures can be lifesaving when you need to stop bleeding and hold the sides of a cut securely together, allowing it to heal properly on its own or giving you time to reach the ER for urgent care.
MUST-HAVE IN EVERY FIRST AID KIT — We hope you’ll never need laceration closure strips, but if you’re an survival enthusiast or work in an environment where injuries can happen, it’s best to be prepared. Keep butterfly stitches bandages in your backpack, car, or home first aid kit for emergency treating.
QUICK AND PAINLESS — Use MYHELP butterfly stitches for wounds to quickly and painlessly stop blood loss with just a few simple steps. These emergency wound closure strips also prevent the laceration from widening during movement, which is crucial when hiking, kayaking, or hunting.
STITCHLESS TECHNOLOGY — Keep a wound closure kit on hand to close cuts with hospital-grade effectiveness, avoiding the pain and discomfort of surgical sutures, whether you’re far from medical care, working on a farm, or enjoying outdoor sports.
EASY TO APPLY AND REMOVE — MYHELP butterfly closure bandages are designed for ease of use, making them ideal for kids, where quick and simple application matters most. Just follow the instructions to apply the butterfly bandages for wound closure to your hands, legs, fingers, or head in seconds.
VARIETY OF USE — You’ll get two types of butterfly strips for wound closure, each in a different size, allowing you to treat a range of wounds from minor cuts to serious lacerations. The MyHelp laceration kit is an essential part of your safety, whether you’re cooking in the kitchen or camping and fishing far from the city. By the way, these closers are suitable for humans and your beloved pets :)
REDUCE SCARRING — Unlike traditional stitches, butterfly sutures use a non-invasive technique that keeps the skin on either side of the laceration intact, without any punctures. Using the MYHELP wound closure device promotes smoother healing with minimal scarring.
GREAT VALUE — Our value kit includes everything you need for complete wound care when you’re away from hospital conditions. Clean the wound with the included alcohol wipe, quickly close it with our sterile butterfly bandage that stays securely in place thanks to strong yet hypoallergenic glue, and protect the area with the included breathable adhesive pad. Trust MYHELP and stay safe wherever you are!

input.bullet_points:
Rapid Full-Surface Heating: Our food warming mat is powered by 500W and we adopt the graphene heating principle, which can generate heat quickly. Our thoughtfully designed graphene heating ensures quick and even distribution, no need to carefully position your food as it efficiently transfers heat.
Premium Silicone Nano Material: Our electric warming tray is made of premium flexible silicone nano material, which is splash-proof, stain-proof and oil-proof, combining durability and practicality. It can be folded and stored without creases, guaranteeing long-lasting use.
Compact and Rollable Storage: This food heating tray comes with a soft storage strap for easy rolling and storage. Embrace portability and save space effortlessly. After use, simply roll it up and secure it with the strap for space-saving storage. Perfect for RV travel, camping trips and other outdoor activities.
Customized 6-Stage Heat Control & Time Modes: Choose from 6 preset heating temperatures to meet your specific food temperature preferences and ensure an ideal dining experience. Your eating experience will be easily enhanced by our 6-level heat control and time modes, which guarantees that your food is kept at the ideal temperature.
Versatile Year-Round Use: Beyond serving as a food warmer, our heating mat is a versatile home assistant. Unlock a range of functionalities, from quick defrosting to facilitating dough fermentation. In order to accommodate your different needs during the winter, you may also use it to raise the temperature of your face mask with this food warming tray.
Capacity: This warm plate is a must-have for your kitchen. It can accommodate 6 8-inch plates. Keep your meals at the perfect temperature and enhance your dining convenience and enjoyment.
[PLEASE NOTE]: For using our warming mat on stone or quartz surfaces, it's important to note that these surfaces are heat-sensitive. To avoid damage to your tabletop, either place an insulated mat beneath the product or preheat the surface with a hot towel first. And remember to start with the lowest temperature setting and then gradually increase it as needed. The heat-insulating pad can be purchased together in the product bundle list
input.title: FYY Warming Mat for Food - Rapid and Full Surface Heating, 6 Temp Settings, 6H Timer, Rollable Portable Food Warming Mat, Ideal for Gatherings, Parties, Keep Meal Warm (X Large Size, Gray)

1️⃣ Natural Beeswax Blend for Long-Lasting Freshness - Crafted with a blend of natural beeswax, jojoba oil, and tree resin, these breathable cotton bags lock in moisture to keep bread soft and flavorful. Ideal for storing sourdough, bagels, or baked goods in the freezer or refrigerator.
2️⃣ Secure Buckle Closure & Easy to Use Bread Bags - The reinforced buckle ensures a tight seal to prevent air exposure and freezer burn, similar to how a well - sealed bread box works. Simply deflate excess air, roll the edges down, and store bread slices or whole loaves securely. Whether you're storing in the pantry or taking it on - the - go, this bag offers the convenience of a portable bread bag.
3️⃣ Fits All Bread Sizes Multi - Purpose Bread Bags - Designed to accommodate both small and large loaves (up to 12 inches), these boxes are lightweight and portable for picnics, lunches, or pantry storage. Use for bread, vegetables, snacks, or dry goods, just like a versatile bread bag that can hold various items.
4️⃣ Durable & Reusable for Sustainable Homes' Bread Bags - Hand - washable cotton fabric with beeswax lining lasts for years, reducing single - use waste. A practical choice for everyday kitchen storage and eco - conscious households, acting as a long - lasting alternative to traditional disposable bread storage solutions and a sustainable version of a bread bag.
5️⃣ Thoughtful Addition to OHIYO Bread Bags - With charming prints and functional design, these bags pair perfectly with homemade bread or baking tools. A great choice for anyone who loves fresh, preservative - free baked goods, making them an attractive addition to any kitchen, much like a stylish bread bag.

input.bullet_points:
20 OZ INDIGO BLUE FLEX SIP BOTTLE: Designed for hot drinks, Hydro Flask's insulated Wide Mouth water bottle with Flex Sip Lid is cupholder compatible and leakproof. This insulated, stainless steel bottle is ideal for coffee or tea, keeping hot drinks hot and cold drinks cold.
24 HOURS COLD. 12 HOURS HOT: Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps drinks hot or cold for hours. The insulated bottle keeps beverages cold for 24 hours and hot up to 12. The TempShield insulation keeps the bottle cool to the touch.
LEAKPROOF: Say goodbye to leaky water bottles. The Flex Sip Lid is leakproof when closed. Simply twist it shut and toss it into your bag without worry. Enjoy hot drinks, and rest easy knowing your drink stays securely sealed all day.
PURE TASTE: Durable pro-grade stainless steel ensures pure taste and no leftover flavor transfer. So, today's mocha won't have any taste of yesterday's morning brew.
FITS CUPHOLDERS: The cupholder-friendly design means your bottle fits seamlessly in most cupholders. Designed for seamless cupholder cohabitation, it's right at home on the open road, on the sidelines, in a pack or wherever you need to set your sips.
DISHWASHER SAFE: Easy to use and easy to clean, just toss the lid and bottles into the dishwasher. Designed to keep bright color, being dishwasher safe means your favorite Hydro Flask is always at-the-ready.
input.description: Designed with hot drinks in mind, Hydro Flask's 20 oz Wide Mouth bottle with Flex Sip Lid™ is cupholder compatible and leakproof. This insulated, stainless steel bottle is ideal for coffee, tea or your favorite beverage, while keeping hot drinks hot and cold drinks cold.
